!Priestess Athenia: If you think that by completing some menial task for Iason Heine makes us lifelong pals, then you are sadly mistaken. If you are to help us, then we must be assured of your dedication to our cause. If you are willing to prove your trustworthiness to us, then I shall give you a test.
